name: SILENT DOOM
description:
SILENT DOOM is an atmospheric first-person horror adventure set in a nightmarish universe. Gameplay consists of combat, exploration, and puzzle-solving. The objective of the player is to guide main protagonist through a monster-filled world as he searches for answers of what is happening.

It is designed around the idea of "being thrown into the world". Isolated and lost inside this dream-like world.
Every location contains its own theme (story), puzzles and characters that are integral in creating a cohesive world. Throughout the game you will open up new areas, acquire different skills of survival, weapons, various items and try to comprehend the sights presented to you.
